briefdescription.para: project used to retrieve layers from layer IDs
Create map theme collection that handles themes of the given project.
Apply theme given by its name and modify layer tree, current style of layers and checked legend items of passed layer tree model.
Remove all map themes from the collection.
Returns whether a map theme with a matching name exists.
Inserts a new map theme to the collection.
Returns a list of existing map theme names.
Returns the recorded state of a map theme.
Gets layer style overrides (for QgsMapSettings) of the visible layers for given map theme.
Returns the list of layer IDs that are visible for the specified map theme.

simplesect.para: The order of the returned list is not guaranteed to reflect the order of layers in the canvas.

briefdescription.para: Returns the list of layers that are visible for the specified map theme.

simplesect.para: The order of the returned list is not guaranteed to reflect the order of layers in the canvas.

briefdescription.para: Returns the master layer order (this will always match the project's QgsProject::layerOrder() ).

detaileddescription.para:
All map themes will maintain the same layer order as the master layer order.
masterVisibleLayers()
QGIS 3.0

briefdescription.para: Returns the master list of visible layers.

detaileddescription.para:
The order of returned layers will always match those of masterLayerOrder(), but the returned layers are filtered to only include those visible in the project's layer tree.
masterLayerOrder()
QGIS 3.0

briefdescription.para: The QgsProject on which this map theme collection works.
Reads the map theme collection state from XML.
Remove an existing map theme from collection.
The QgsProject on which this map theme collection works.
Updates a map theme within the collection.

parameterdescription.para: name of map theme to update
map theme record to replace existing map theme

briefdescription.para: Writes the map theme collection state to XML.
Static method to create theme from the current state of layer visibilities in layer tree, current style of layers and check state of legend items (from a layer tree model).
Emitted when a map theme changes definition.
Emitted when map themes within the collection are changed.
Emitted when the project changes.

detaileddescription.para:
The QgsProject on which this map theme collection works.
QGIS 3.0
QGIS 3.0

briefdescription.para: Update style name if a stored style gets renamed.
Handles updates of the map theme collection when layers are removed from the registry.
Apply check states of legend nodes of a given layer as defined in the map theme.
Reconnects all map theme layers to handle style renames.
Container class that allows storage of map themes consisting of visible map layers and layer styles.
